scripts.copy-app-assets: shx --verbose cp src/.txt dist/ | true && shx --verbose cp src/.html dist/ | true && shx --verbose cp src/*.ejs dist/ | true
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-styles && npm run copy-app-assets
scripts.dist: mkdir lib && cd dist && tar cvzf ../lib/<%-name.toLowerCase()%>.tar.gz *
